text: @realDonaldTrump "I just want all of this to be over," whines @POTUS, #ThePresidentThatRanAway, from his @WhiteHouse bunker while 40+ million #Americans are out of work, over 106K of them dead from #COVID19, and thousands are at his very front door demanding justice for the #GeorgeFloydMurder.
